channel.title: RSCD v25 login server issue
channel.description:
Need a little help running my ls... There are not other Java services running.. just Easy-PHP and the java enviorment tool compiler thing..
first off the error is [code] Buildfile: build.xml
runls: [java] Login Server starting up... [java] Connected to MySQL [java] LoginEngine now running [java] java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind [java] at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [java] at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source) [java] at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [java] at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerN ew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [java] at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$80 0(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [java] at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$Worker.ru n(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [java] at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NamePreservin gRunnable.java:51) [java] at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [java] Java Result: 1
BUILD SUCCESSFUL Total time: 1 second [/code]
my ls.conf is [code] <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd"> <properties> <comment>RSCD-LS Config</comment> <entry key="mysqlhost">localhost</entry> <entry key="mysqldb">rd</entry> <entry key="mysqluser">root</entry> <entry key="mysqlpass"></entry> <entry key="lsip">localhost</entry> <entry key="lsport">34522</entry> <entry key="queryip">localhost</entry> <entry key="queryport">8181</entry> </properties> [/code]
and my server conf is [code] <?xml version="1" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd"> <properties> <comment>RSCD Config</comment> <entry key="version">31</entry> <entry key="ip">localhost</entry> <entry key="port">43594</entry> <entry key="name">RSCD</entry> <entry key="location">Dallas</entry> <entry key="maxplayers">800</entry> <entry key="servernum">1</entry> <entry key="lsip">localhost</entry> <entry key="lsport">34522</entry> </properties> [/code]
leme know if you need anymore info..

item.title: RSCD v25 login server issue
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

I got it, thanks lol.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD v25 login server issue
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

Up the port by 1 and keep on going. If there’s no java process’ running, then something else is occupying the port.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD v25 login server issue
item.dc:creator: @Shob Shob
item.description:
@Shob wrote:

Need a little help running my ls…
There are not other Java services running… just Easy-PHP and the java enviorment tool compiler thing…

first off the error is

Buildfile: build.xml

runls:
     [java] Login Server starting up...
     [java] Connected to MySQL
     [java] LoginEngine now running
     [java] java.net.BindException: Address already in use: bind
     [java]     at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method)
     [java]     at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Source)
     [java]     at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source)
     [java]     at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.registerN
ew(SocketAcceptor.java:363)
     [java]     at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.access$80
0(SocketAcceptor.java:55)
     [java]     at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$Worker.ru
n(SocketAcceptor.java:222)
     [java]     at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NamePreservin
gRunnable.java:51)
     [java]     at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
     [java] Java Result: 1

BUILD SUCCESSFUL
Total time: 1 second

my ls.conf is

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd">
<properties>
	<comment>RSCD-LS Config</comment>
	<entry key="mysqlhost">localhost</entry>
	<entry key="mysqldb">rd</entry>
	<entry key="mysqluser">root</entry>
	<entry key="mysqlpass"></entry>
	<entry key="lsip">localhost</entry>
	<entry key="lsport">34522</entry>
	<entry key="queryip">localhost</entry>
	<entry key="queryport">8181</entry>
</properties>

and my server conf is

<?xml version="1" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<!DOCTYPE properties SYSTEM "http://java.sun.com/dtd/properties.dtd">
<properties>
	<comment>RSCD Config</comment>
	<entry key="version">31</entry>
	<entry key="ip">localhost</entry>
	<entry key="port">43594</entry>
	<entry key="name">RSCD</entry>
	<entry key="location">Dallas</entry>
	<entry key="maxplayers">800</entry>
	<entry key="servernum">1</entry>
	<entry key="lsip">localhost</entry>
	<entry key="lsport">34522</entry>
</properties>

leme know if you need anymore info…

Read full topic
